dct_title_s: Plat book of Sanilac County, Michigan
dct_description_sm: Abstract: Atlas of township property maps showing names of rural landowners.
Notes: Scale determined from section lines.
Most pages arranged alphabetically, but some are out of order.
Date estimated by history of Port Sanilac Bank of Platts, Burgess & Co. President James McCaren's obituary states he came to the bank in 1924 and served as president until his death in 1932.
